method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _findtext1
method.comment:
this is a library for quick search and highlight text in lable,edittext,.... add Richstring library
color: 1=Red , 2=Black , 3=White , 4=Green , 5=Blue , 6=Magenta , 7=Yellow example:
Dim find as Findtext Dim l1 As Label Dim et1 As EditText Dim et2 As EditText Dim s as string
find.findtext1(l1,et1,1) find.findtext1(et2,et1,7) find.findtext2(et2,s,7)
By:www.ShamimeVesal.ir

method.name: _findtext2
method.comment:
this is a library for quick search and highlight text in lable,edittext,.... add Richstring library
color: 1=Red , 2=Black , 3=White , 4=Green , 5=Blue , 6=Magenta , 7=Yellow example:
Dim find as Findtext Dim l1 As Label Dim et1 As EditText Dim et2 As EditText Dim s as string
find.findtext1(l1,et1,1) find.findtext1(et2,et1,7) find.findtext2(et2,s,7)
